VPlants.HydroRoot User Guide

Version

Release

1.0.0

Date

Jul 19, 2022

This manual details functions, modules, and objects included in OpenAlea.HydroRoot, describing what they are and what they do. For a complete reference guide, see Reference guide.

Warning

This “User Guide” is still very much in progress. Many aspects of OpenAlea.HydroRoot are not covered.

More documentation can be found on the openalea wiki.
